title: Losing Monitor Signal When Gaming
body: So, I just recently got a new monitor which is bigger than my older one. It was 1680x1050 now its 1920x1080. Before when I played league of any other game it would work fine. Now with this new monitor after playing for about 10-45 min it loses my mointor signal which leaves my pc on and the only way to turn it on is to restart computer manually. I have checked the cables used both different HDMI and VGA cables both work until I start gaming. If I use the browser or anything but games, it works fine. I have also tried to change in-game resoultion from 1920x1080 back to 1680x1050 which did not change anyting. Any ideas what could be the problem. Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Your resolution may be too big for league too support, especially if it's over 1080 or a 4K. Since you already tried reducing your resolution, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will help out individually with your specific issue.  We'll reply back asap!
